questions.text: How many different clans did Melinda say were at Merryweather High School?
questions.explanation:
13.

	She described the clans as jocks, country clubbers, idiot savants, cheerleaders, human waste, future Fascists of America, Eurotrash, big hair chix, suffering artists, the Marthas, thespians, goths, and outcasts. Melinda described herself as being an outcast.

questions.text: What is Melinda's first class of the new school year?
questions.explanation:
Biology.

	Melinda couldn't find the biology class so she was given a demerit for being late.

questions.text: During art class, the teacher made the students pick a word out of a hat that they would have to create in an artistic form. What word did Melinda pick?
questions.explanation:
Tree.

	After drawing the word, Melinda wanted another word, but the teacher made her keep the one she had.

questions.text: Why did some of the students at Merryweather High School hate Melinda?
questions.correct: She called the cops during a party
options: She wasn't as wealthy as they were
They knew that she hated them
Her boyfriend was the most popular guy in school
questions.explanation:
She called the cops during a party.

	During a basketball game, it was revealed that Melinda called the police during an end-of-summer party. Melinda called the police to get them to help her after she was assaulted, but she never got the chance to tell the police what happened to her because she left the party.

questions.text: What is the boy's name that Melinda referred to as "It"?
questions.explanation:
Andy.

	It is revealed later in the book that the night of the party, Andy assaulted Melinda.

questions.text: Which talk show host did Melinda not hear talking to her about the assault?
questions.explanation:
Montel Williams.

	Melinda was home from school with a fever and she was flipping channels thinking about what the talk show hosts would say to her if she told them about the assault.

questions.text: Who was the first person Melinda told about the assault?
questions.explanation:
Rachel.

	Melinda and Rachel were in the library when Melinda wrote to Rachel on a piece of notebook paper that Andy had assaulted her. Melinda wanted Rachel to know because Rachel was dating Andy.

questions.text: After Melinda wrote "Guys to Stay Away From" on the bathroom stall, who showed Melinda what some other girls had written about that guy underneath what Melinda wrote?
questions.explanation:
Ivy.

	Melinda said she felt like flying after finding out that other girls thought "It" was a pervert.

questions.text: Melinda found out that Rachel broke up with "It" on prom night.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She came to school the next day and heard the rumors of their breakup.

questions.text: Who found Melinda holding a piece of glass to "Its" throat after he tried to assault her again?
options: Mr. Neck, the social studies teacher
questions.explanation:
Lacrosse team.

	Melinda's ex-friend Nicole was also with the Lacrosse team when they opened the door and found Melinda holding a piece of broken glass to "Its" throat.
